## Phase IX & X Implementation Summary

### Phase IX: Mobile, Cloud, Analytics

**3 Major Features**:

1. **Mobile Native Apps** (4 methods)
   - iOS app building (.ipa format)
   - Android app building (.apk format)
   - Web app building (.tar.gz format)
   - Cross-platform support via React Native

2. **Cloud Integration** (4 methods)
   - AWS Lambda/S3/DynamoDB
   - Azure Functions/Blob/Cosmos DB
   - GCP Cloud Functions/Storage/Firestore
   - Auto-scaling configuration

3. **Advanced Analytics** (4 methods)
   - Event tracking system
   - Metrics aggregation
   - Analytics report generation
   - Performance summaries

**Tests**: âœ… 3/3 passing

### Phase X: Enterprise, AI, Collaboration, Security

**4 Major Features**:

1. **Enterprise Integration** (4 methods)
   - SSO support (Okta, Azure AD, Google, GitHub)
   - RBAC with 4 roles
   - License management
   - Compliance frameworks (GDPR, SOC2, HIPAA, PCI-DSS)

2. **AI Assistance** (5 methods)
   - Code completion
   - Error detection
   - Optimization suggestions
   - Documentation generation
   - Security analysis

3. **Real-Time Collaboration** (4 methods)
   - Multi-user editing (50 concurrent)
   - Operational transformation
   - Inline comments with threading
   - Presence awareness

4. **Advanced Security** (4 methods)
   - TLS 1.3 transport encryption
   - AES-256 at-rest encryption
   - MFA (TOTP, WebAuthn, SMS)
   - Vulnerability scanning

**Tests**: âœ… 4/4 passing
